name: Word Miner - Multiplayer
description:
Find the hidden words in all categories as fast as possible! Climb to the top of Leaderboard!

Challenge your friends with Multiplayer mode, earn the highest points!

Find the hidden words and then swipe up, down, left, right or diagonally to mark them. The game is starting from easier levels, then continues with the harder ones, challenging you gradually.
Earn 3 stars in each level to be the best!



- 5 different languages for all puzzles : English, German, French, Arabic, Turkish
- Brilliant UI with HD graphics
- 3 different game modes
- Realtime generated new puzzles
- Use hints when you get stuck
